overview: Big Ben, Queen Liz and the Eye, everyone knows these, but London is also famed for its vast pool of fit young men from all over the world so where better to start than everyone’s favourite city – London! Jack Jones is one horny man with a camera, following his friends hoping to get in on some hard action, and the insatiable mates he has don’t disappoint! Featuring the native English in each scene but with some hot variety to spice things up, we’re treated to the some very sexy positions, huge dicks and some very, very hungry butts. Whoever said the English were bad in bed?! They need to book a flight to London for some lessons in London lovemaking!
tagline: Check out the hottest hung men that London has to offer! You won't want to miss them in action!
title: World of Men: London
